Package com.behreajj.camzup.friendly

Class ZImage

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PImage
com.behreajj.camzup.friendly.ZImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, processing.core.PConstants
public class ZImage extends processing.core.PImage
An extension of PImage, specializing in color gradients and blitting text to an image.

  • Method Details

    • alphaToArgb

      public static processing.core.PImage alphaToArgb(processing.core.PImage image)
      Convert an image in the PConstants.ALPHA format to an image in the PConstants.ARGB format. Returns images of other formats unchanged.
      Parameters:
      image - the image
      Returns:
      the conversion

    • copy

      public static processing.core.PImage copy(processing.core.PImage source, processing.core.PImage target)
      Copies a source image's pixels to a target. If the target is a PGraphics, then wraps the source image without changing the target's dimensions.

      Does not copy the parent PApplet field.
      Parameters:
      source - the source image
      target - the target image
      Returns:
      the copied image.
      See Also:
      • wrap(PImage, int, int, PImage)

    • fill

      public static processing.core.PImage fill(int c, processing.core.PImage target)
      Fills an image with a color in place. The color is expected to be a 32-bit color integer.
      Parameters:
      c - the fill color
      target - the target image
      Returns:
      the image

    • fill

      public static processing.core.PImage fill(Rgb c, processing.core.PImage target)
      Fills an image in place with a color.
      Parameters:
      target - the target image
      c - the fill color
      Returns:
      the image

    • fromText

      public static processing.core.PImage fromText(processing.core.PFont font, String text)
      Blits glyph images from a PFont onto a single image. Defaults to the fill color white.

      Images created with this method do not have a reference to a parent PApplet.
      Parameters:
      font - the Processing font
      text - the string of text
      Returns:
      the new image

    • fromText

      public static processing.core.PImage fromText(processing.core.PFont font, String text, int fillClr)
      Blits glyph images from a PFont onto a single image.

      Images created with this method do not have a reference to a parent PApplet.
      Parameters:
      font - the Processing font
      text - the string of text
      fillClr - the color
      Returns:
      the new image

    • fromText

      public static processing.core.PImage fromText(processing.core.PFont font, String text, int fillClr, int leading)
      Blits glyph images from a PFont onto a single image. The leading is measured in pixels. Negative values are not allowed.

      Images created with this method do not have a reference to a parent PApplet.
      Parameters:
      font - the Processing font
      text - the string of text
      fillClr - the color
      leading - spacing between lines
      Returns:
      the new image

    • fromText

      public static processing.core.PImage fromText(processing.core.PFont font, String text, int fillClr, int leading, int kerning)
      Blits glyph images from a PFont onto a single image. The leading and kerning are measured in pixels. Negative values are not allowed.

      Images created with this method do not have a reference to a parent PApplet.
      Parameters:
      font - the Processing font
      text - the string of text
      fillClr - the color
      leading - spacing between lines
      kerning - spacing between characters
      Returns:
      the new image

    • fromText

      public static processing.core.PImage fromText(processing.core.PFont font, String text, int fillClr, int leading, int kerning, int textAlign)
      Blits glyph images from a PFont onto a single image. The leading and kerning are measured in pixels. Negative values are not allowed. The horizontal text alignment may be either center PConstants.CENTER ( 3 ), right PConstants.RIGHT ( 39 ) or left PConstants.LEFT ( 37 ).

      Images created with this method do not have a reference to a parent PApplet.
      Parameters:
      font - the Processing font
      text - the string of text
      fillClr - the color
      leading - spacing between lines
      kerning - spacing between characters
      textAlign - the horizontal alignment
      Returns:
      the new image

    • fromText

      public static processing.core.PImage fromText(processing.core.PFont font, String text, Rgb fillClr)
      Blits glyph images from a PFont onto a single image.

      Images created with this method do not have a reference to a parent PApplet.
      Parameters:
      font - the Processing font
      text - the string of text
      fillClr - the color
      Returns:
      the new image

    • fromText

      public static processing.core.PImage fromText(processing.core.PFont font, String text, Rgb fillClr, int leading, int kerning, int textAlign)
      Blits glyph images from a PFont onto a single image. The leading and kerning are measured in pixels. Negative values are not allowed. The horizontal text alignment may be either center PConstants.CENTER ( 3 ), right PConstants.RIGHT ( 39 ) or left PConstants.LEFT ( 37 ).

      Images created with this method do not have a reference to a parent PApplet.
      Parameters:
      font - the Processing font
      text - the string of text
      fillClr - the color
      leading - spacing between lines
      kerning - spacing between characters
      textAlign - the horizontal alignment
      Returns:
      the new image

    • unpremul

      public static processing.core.PImage unpremul(processing.core.PImage source, processing.core.PImage target)
      Divides the red, green and blue channels of each pixel in a source image by the alpha channel. Reverse pre-multiplication.
      Parameters:
      source - the source image
      target - the target image
      Returns:
      the image
      See Also:
      • unpremul(int[], int[])

    • wrap

      public static processing.core.PImage wrap(processing.core.PImage source, int dx, int dy, processing.core.PImage target)
      Blits a source image's pixels onto a target image's pixels, using integer floor modulo to wrap the source image. The source image can be offset horizontally and/or vertically, creating the illusion of parallax.
      Parameters:
      source - the source image
      dx - horizontal pixel offset
      dy - vertical pixel offset
      target - the target image
      Returns:
      the image

    • premul

      protected static int[] premul(int[] source, int[] target)
      Multiplies the red, green and blue channels of each pixel by its alpha channel.
      Parameters:
      source - the source pixels
      target - the target pixels
      Returns:
      the pre-multiplied image

    • unpremul

      protected static int[] unpremul(int[] source, int[] target)
      Divides the red, green and blue channels of each pixel in the image by its alpha channel. Reverse pre-multiplication.
      Parameters:
      source - the source pixels
      target - the target pixels
      Returns:
      the unpremultiplied pixels
